handoff_reason: Cross-agent reconciliation of webhook server Cloudflare + OAuth progress, Notion items, and documentation updates.

context.current_step: Validate environment-specific status and reconcile Notion items after DNS-related Notion API failure.

OAuth callback endpoints added for Spotify and Adobe
Redirect URI alignment updated in local envs and docs
Notion sync attempted but blocked by DNS resolution to api.notion.com

required_action: Review the consolidated report and validate in your environment: (1) Cloudflare tunnel config + DNS health, (2) OAuth redirect URI alignment for Google/Spotify/Adobe, (3) webhook server location expectations per architecture, (4) Notion pending items. If you have working DNS/Notion access, re-run pending Notion sync for the failed items and update documentation or tasks as needed.
success_criteria: Environment-specific validation completed and discrepancies documented
Notion pending writes synced or confirmed blocked with evidence
Any required doc updates identified and queued
Feedback delivered to coordinating agent with blockers and next steps
